评论概述: Not like they used to be.
评论详情: I have had a pair of these gloves for several years and I recently lost one. I loved them. They are supple and fit great. I am disappointed in the new lining. The previous lining for these gloves were more like fleece or velvet feeling and the new ones have a wool blend that is slightly itchy. I still love the fit of these gloves, just not crazy about the lining anymore, plus they don't keep my hands as warm as my previous pair.
These are so soft and beautiful.  You will not be disappointed.  I've given these gloves as gifts to 3 people.  They are always so appreciated.  They are WARM, well-made and high quality.

I've ordered a few gloves from them over the years and the quality control has gone downhill. I ordered a pair (7) and one of the thumbs was sewn wrong. Returned and ordered 2 in different sizes (7 and 7.5). One pair was good and true to size. The other pair was too small (7.5 was smaller than 7). Will be looking into other companies for future glove purchases.

评论概述: I should have gotten the medium.

I wear sterile gloves all the time, I know my hand size. I asked for my hand size, a pair of gloves arrive with NO SIZE on the box or inside the glove. It’s made in China and obviously for a child. Do NOT BUY if you hand size is a true 7 or up.

If I bought them again I would get a smaller size.That said, they are very cute and seem to be holding up well. I’ve had them for a month and wore them maybe a dozen times.
